file.name: TravelRestrictions_v1_swagger_specification.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0 info: title: Travel Restrictions version: 1.0.2 description: |-

This version will be decommissioned the 26th of January 2023. Please use the [latest version](https://developers.amadeus.com/self-service/category/covid-19-and-travel-safety/api-doc/travel-restrictions/api-reference)

Before using this API, we recommend you read our **[Authorization Guide](https://developers.amadeus.com/self-service/apis-docs/guides/authorization-262)** for more information on how to generate an access token. servers: - url: https://test.api.amadeus.com/v1 paths: /duty-of-care/diseases/covid19-area-report: parameters: [] get: summary: Returns Covid-19 restrictions on targeted area operationId: GETCovidReport parameters: - schema: type: string minLength: 2 maxLength: 2 in: query example: US name: countryCode required: true description: >- [ISO 3166](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) Alpha-2 code. e.g. "US" United States of America. - schema: type: string minLength: 3 maxLength: 3 in: query name: cityCode description: >- [IATA code](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx) for city metropolitan area. responses: '200': description: Successful Reply content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: warnings: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/warnings' meta: $ref: '#/components/schemas/meta' data: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/DiseaseAreaReport' examples: example: value: data: - type: covid19-area-report area: name: United States of America areaType: Country iataCode: US geoCode: latitude: '37.0902' longitude: '95.7129' summary: >-

Authorities imposed international travel restrictions from late February 2020

diseaseRiskLevel: High diseaseInfection: rate: '176.02' level: Extreme date: '2021-04-25' infectionMapLink: >- https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2020/us/coronavirus-us-cases.html diseaseCases: confirmed: 32940846 deaths: 585970 recovered: 0 active: 32354876 date: '2021-05-06' hotspots: >-

Minnesota, Michigan, Pennsylvania, New Jersey, Delaware, New York, Connecticut, Rhode Island, New Hampshire, Vermont, Massachusetts

dataSources: governmentSiteLink: https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/index.html healthDepartmentSiteLink: https://www.helsenorge.no/en/coronavirus/ areaRestrictions: - text: >-

A nightly nationwide curfew is in effect from 21:00-06:00 local time until further notice.

date: '2021-05-02' restrictionType: Lockdown areaAccessRestrictions: transportation: text: >-

American Airlines, United Airlines, Delta Air Lines and other major carriers have suspended most flights to China, Hong Kong, Macau, the UK, continental Europe and Latin America. Officials partially lifted a ban on flights by Air China, China Eastern Airlines, China Southern Airlines, and Xiamen Airlines after Chinese authorities allowed United and Delta airlines to operate one round-trip between the two countries.

isBanned: Partial throughDate: indef date: '2021-04-25' transportationType: Air declarartionDocumentations: text: >-

Arriving travellers must complete a passenger locator form within 24 hours of arrival.

documentRequired: 'Yes' travelDocumentLink: >- https://travel.state.gov/content/travel/en/traveladvisories/ea/covid-19-information.html healthDocumentLink: >- https://travel.state.gov/content/travel/en/traveladvisories/ea/covid-19-information.html date: '2021-05-03' entry: text: >-

Travellers arriving from or transiting through India, South Africa, China, Iran, Brazil, Ireland, the United Kingdom and the European Schengen Area countries of Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Monaco, San Marin and Vatican City within 14 days of their planned arrival in the US are barred from entry.

exemptions: >- https://travel.state.gov/content/travel/en/News/visas-news/presidential-proclamation-coronavirus.html ban: Partial throughDate: indef rules: >- https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/travelers/from-other-countries.html date: '2021-04-26' diseaseTesting: when: Before travel requirement: Mandatory text: >-

All passengers on inbound international flights - including US citizens and fully vaccinated people - must present a negative COVID-19 test result

rules: >- https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/travelers/testing-international-air-travelers.html#:~:text=On%20January%2012%2C%202021%2C%20CDC,airline%20before%20boarding%20the%20flight. isRequired: 'Yes' date: '2021-05-05' tracingApplication: text: >-

There is no national contact tracing app. Local authorities have developed or are developing optional platforms through Apple's Exposure Notification API in multiple states, including Alabama, Arizona, California, Colorado, Delaware, Maryland, Michigan, Nevada, New York, North Carolina, North Dakota, Oregon, Pennsylvania, South Carolina, Virginia Washington and Wyoming, the District of Columbia, and territories, including Guam and Puerto Rico.

isRequired: 'No' date: '2021-05-05' quarantineModality: text: >-

International travellers are not required to quarantine upon arrival. However, the CDC recommends that travellers stay home and self-quarantine for 7 days after arrival. Travellers should take a test again 3-5 days after arrival; if a test is not available or results are delayed, travellers are recommended to stay home and self-quarantine for a total of 10 days after travelling.

rules: >- https://travel.state.gov/content/travel/en/traveladvisories/ea/covid-19-information.html eligiblePerson: None date: '2021-05-05' masks: isRequired: Yes, conditional text: >-

Some states and territories require residents to wear masks while out in public. Violators may be subject to fines and be denied entry to businesses and use of public transport. Most states and territories have voluntary measures or measures restricted to specific venues and municipalities.

Enforcement varies widely and is not consistently enforced below the federal level. Masks must be worn in federal government buildings as well as on inter-state transport, including at airports and onboard flights, trains, planes, intercity buses and ferries until at least 13 September.

date: '2021-05-05' exit: isAllowed: 'No' text: >-

There are no exit restrictions though international travel is strongly discouraged.

rules: >- https://travel.state.gov/content/travel/en/traveladvisories/traveladvisories.html/ date: '2021-05-05' otherRestrictions: text: >-

Effective 23 April-20 May, a state of exception will be imposed in NYC

date: '2021-05-05' areaPolicy: text: >-

Limited federal policies for quarantine, testing and masking are in effect nationwide. Most policy decisions are implemented at the state, county and municipal level.

status: Distancing startDate: '2021-04-23' endDate: indef date: '2021-05-03' subArea: - area: name: Houston areaType: City iataCode: HOU geoCode: latitude: '29.75894' longitude: '-95.3676' summary: >-

Authorities were quick to impose curfew measures from mid-March 2020 .

diseaseRiskLevel: High meta: language: EN links: self: >- https://api.amadeus.net/v1/duty-of-care/disease/covid19-area-report?countryCode=US&cityCode=HOU&language=EN '400': description: |+ Bad Request code | title ------- | ------------------------------------- 4926 | INVALID DATA RECEIVED 32171 | MANDATORY DATA MISSING content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: errors: type: array items: type: object description: The Error Definition title: Error properties: status: type: integer description: >- The [HTTP status code](https://www.iana.org/assignments/http-status-codes/http-status-codes.xhtml) of this response. This is present only in terminal errors which cause an unsuccessful response. In the case of multiple errors, they must all have the same status. code: type: integer description: >- A machine-readable error code from the Amadeus Canned Messages table, that will enable the API Consumers code to handle this type of error title: type: string description: >- An error title from the Canned Messages table with a 1:1 correspondence to the error code. This may be localized detail: type: string description: >- An easy-to-read explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem. It should give the API consumer an idea of what went wrong and how to recover from it. Like the title, this field’s value can be localized. source: type: object title: Error_Source properties: parameter: type: string description: >- The key of the URI path or query parameter that caused the error pointer: type: string description: >- A JSON Pointer [RFC6901] to the associated entity in the request body that caused this error example: type: string description: >- A sample input to guide the user when resolving this issue examples: example-400: value: errors: - status: 400 code: 32171 title: MANDATORY DATA MISSING detail: >- CONTENT IS MISSING IN THE GIVEN REQUEST, PLEASE CHECK AND RESEND YOUR REQUEST '500': description: |- Internal Server Error code | title ------- | ------------------------------------- 141 | SYSTEM ERROR HAS OCCURRED content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: errors: type: array items: $ref: >- #/paths/~1duty-of-care~1diseases~1covid19-area-report/get/responses/400/content/application~1json/schema/properties/errors/items examples: example-500: value: errors: - status: 500 code: 141 title: SYSTEM ERROR HAS OCCURRED '501': description: |- Not Implemented code | title ------- | ------------------------------------- 141 | UNABLE TO SUPPORT content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: errors: type: array items: $ref: >- #/paths/~1duty-of-care~1diseases~1covid19-area-report/get/responses/400/content/application~1json/schema/properties/errors/items examples: example-501: value: errors: - status: 501 code: 141 title: UNABLE TO SUPPORT description: ' ' tags: - Covid-19 Area Report components: schemas: Exit: allOf: - $ref: '#/components/schemas/DatedInformation' - type: object properties: specialRequirements: type: string description: >- Exit country Document is requried or not for International travel eg Yes/No rulesLink: type: string description: |- Requirements to exit country Website information isBanned: type: string description: >- Yes/ Recommended Partial/ No; 'Yes' indicates all travellers are banned from leaving; 'Recommended' indicates that travellers should not leave, but are mostly free to do so; 'Partial' indicates that some travellers may leave, but others are prevented; 'No' indicates all travellers are free to leave title: Exit Restriction description: '' Entry: title: Entry Restriction allOf: - $ref: '#/components/schemas/DatedInformation' - type: object properties: ban: type: string description: >- Indicates if entry for all or some types of people is banned. "Yes" includes situations that are equivalent to a ban throughDate: type: string description: >- Latest end date for entry ban. Date in YYYY-MM-DD format OR "indefinite" OR blank rules: type: string description: Rules implied with specific to borders exemptions: type: string description: Rules implied with specific to borders bannedArea: type: array description: >- Countries/territories from where travellers are generally banned from entry due to covid-19 rules. If no travellers are banned based on origin, this will be blank. Uses ISO 3166 country codes items: title: Area description: '' type: object properties: 'name ': type: string description: >- Label associated to the location (e.g. Eiffel Tower, Madison Square) example: '"Eiffel Tower"' iataCode: type: string description: IATA location code example: '"PAR"' geoCode: type: object description: >- Geographic coordinates describing the position of any location on the surface of Earth properties: latitude: type: string description: >- Latitude of the position expressed in decimal degrees (WSG 84), e.g. 6.244203. A positive value denotes northern hemisphere or the equator, and a negative value denotes southern hemisphere. The number of digits to represent the precision of the coordinate. example: '48.85837' longitude: type: string description: >- Longitude of the position expressed in decimal degrees (WSG 84), e.g. -75.581211. A positive value denotes east longitude or the prime meridian, and a negative value denotes west longitude. The number of digits to represent the precision of the coordinate. example: '2.294481' areaType: type: string description: Area Type example country,city,region borderBan: type: array description: Open/Partially Open/Closed items: type: object properties: borderType: type: string description: Land or Maritime or Air status: type: string description: Open/Partially open/Closed MaskRestriction: title: Mask Restriction allOf: - $ref: '#/components/schemas/DatedInformation' - type: object properties: isRequired: type: string description: |- Requirement of Mask Yes,no QuarantineModality: title: Dated Quarantine Restriction allOf: - $ref: '#/components/schemas/DatedInformation' - type: object properties: eligiblePerson: type: string description: |- Who needs to Quarantine on Arrival eg Some travellers quarantineType: type: string description: |- Type of Quarantine Self/Gov duration: type: integer description: Minimum number of days for quarantine period. rules: type: string description: 'Rules of Quarantine on Arrival ' mandateList: type: string description: |- Mandatory On Quarantine on Arrival eg Websites quarantineOnArrivalAreas: description: >- Countries/territories from where travellers are generally required to quarantine on arrival. If no travellers are required to quarantine, this will be blank. Uses ISO 3166 country codes type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Entry/allOf/1/properties/bannedArea/items' TracingApplication: title: Dated Tracing Application Restriction allOf: - $ref: '#/components/schemas/DatedInformation' - type: object properties: isRequired: type: string description: While Entring the Country we need a Government proposed APP iosUrl: type: array description: IOS URLS to Download the app items: type: string androidUrl: type: array description: 'Android URLs for App Download ' items: type: string website: type: string description: '' DiseaseTesting: title: Disease Testing Restriction allOf: - $ref: '#/components/schemas/DatedInformation' - type: object properties: isRequired: type: string description: |- Required Testing eg , Yes,No, "Yes, conditional". when: type: string description: >- When testing is to be done eg "Upon arrival","Before travel, Upon arrival, After arrival" details. requirement: type: string description: |- Is the testing is required eg Mandatory,Yes. rules: type: string description: |- ules regarding the testing eg https://corona.fo/quarantine. testType: type: string description: >- PCR/Antigen/Nucleic acid amplification test (NAAT). The types of Covid-19 tests accepted; more than one type can be selected minimumAge: type: number description: >- Minimum age, in years, that is required to take a Covid-19 test. Under this age, no test is required validityPeriod: type: object properties: delay: type: string description: >- The validity period in hours or no if days as per ISP 8061 for test results referenceDateType: type: string description: >- Arrival/Departure; Test validity time is measured from arrival at destination or departure from origin. If blank, indicates this is not specified description: '' DeclarationDocuments: title: Declaration Documents allOf: - $ref: '#/components/schemas/DatedInformation' - type: object properties: documentRequired: type: string description: |- Health Travel related declartaion Documentations eg Yes/No healthDocumentationLink: type: string description: |- Health document eg "www.edcardaruba.aw" travelDocumentationLink: type: string description: |- Travel document eg "www.edcardaruba.aw" description: '' Transportation: title: Transportation allOf: - $ref: '#/components/schemas/DatedInformation' - type: object properties: transportationType: type: string enum: - FLIGHT - CAR - BUS isBanned: type: string description: '"Yes" or "No". Indicates if transpotation are allow or not. ' throughDate: type: string description: > Latest end date for flight ban. Date in YYYY-MM-DD format OR "indefinite" OR blank AreaAccessRestriction: title: Area Access Restriction type: object description: Restriction applying to enter or leave the Area properties: transportation: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Transportation' declarationDocuments: $ref: '#/components/schemas/DeclarationDocuments' entry: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Entry' diseaseTesting: $ref: '#/components/schemas/DiseaseTesting' tracingApplication: $ref: '#/components/schemas/TracingApplication' quarantineModality: $ref: '#/components/schemas/QuarantineModality' mask: $ref: '#/components/schemas/MaskRestriction' exit: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Exit' otherRestriction: $ref: '#/components/schemas/DatedInformation' diseaseVaccination: $ref: '#/components/schemas/diseaseVaccination' AreaPolicy: title: Area Policy allOf: - $ref: '#/components/schemas/DatedInformation' - type: object properties: status: type: string description: >- Current level of regional movement control. Can be de jure or de facto control. "Lockdown" | "Curfew" | "Distancing" | "None" | "Partial Measures" | "Opening" | "Closing" | "Open" startDate: type: string endDate: type: string description: > Latest end date for current control measures. Date in YYYY-MM-DD format OR "indefinite" OR blank referenceLink: type: string description: Webpage for national Covid-19 policy AreaRestriction: allOf: - $ref: '#/components/schemas/DatedInformation' - type: object properties: restrictionType: type: string description: >- Restriction type like ENUM:Lockdown,Curfew,other,DomasticTravel,Additional Section title: type: string title: Area Restriction DatedInformation: title: Dated Information type: object description: Confirmed information at a given date properties: date: type: string description: 'It will display the last updated date ' text: type: string DataSources: title: Sources type: object properties: covidDashboardLink: type: string description: Information about Covid Dashboard healthDepartementSiteLink: type: string description: Information about health Department Covid Site governmentSiteLink: type: string description: Information about Government Covid Site DiseaseInfection: title: Disease Infection type: object description: Confirmed infinction information at a given date properties: date: type: string description: >- day of report in YYYY-MM-DD format,it will tell the date when this given information last updated level: type: string description: >- Infection risk level. "Extreme" | "High" | "Medium" | "Moderate" | "Low" rate: type: number description: cases reported in 14 days per 100,000 infectionMapLink: type: string description: Disease Infection_map DiseaseCase: title: Disease Case type: object properties: date: type: string description: |+ day of last update, in YYYY-MM-DD format active: type: number description: Active cases. recovered: type: number description: Total Recovered. deaths: type: number description: Total deaths. confirmed: type: number description: Total Confirmed cases. description: Last confrmed picture at the given date DiseaseAreaReport: title: DiseaseAreaReport type: object description: '' properties: type: type: string description: resource Type area: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Area' subAreas: type: array description: it can be city or region items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/DiseaseAreaReport' summary: type: string description: Summary diseaseRiskLevel: type: string description: > Country`s risk level. "Extreme" | "High" | "Medium" | "Moderate" | "Low" diseaseInfection: $ref: '#/components/schemas/DiseaseInfection' diseaseCases: $ref: '#/components/schemas/DiseaseCase' hotspots: type: string description: Area hotspots dataSources: $ref: '#/components/schemas/DataSources' areaRestrictions: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/AreaRestriction' areaAccessRestriction: $ref: '#/components/schemas/AreaAccessRestriction' areaPolicy: $ref: '#/components/schemas/AreaPolicy' relatedArea: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Link' areaVaccinated: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/areaVaccinated' Area: title: Area description: '' type: object properties: 'name ': type: string description: Label associated to the location (e.g. Eiffel Tower, Madison Square) example: Paris iataCode: type: string description: IATA location code example: '"PAR"' geoCode: type: object description: >- Geographic coordinates describing the position of any location on the surface of Earth title: GeoCode properties: latitude: type: number description: >- Latitude of the position expressed in decimal degrees (WSG 84), e.g. 6.244203. A positive value denotes northern hemisphere or the equator, and a negative value denotes southern hemisphere. The number of digits to represent the precision of the coordinate. example: '48.85837' longitude: type: number description: >- Longitude of the position expressed in decimal degrees (WSG 84), e.g. -75.581211. A positive value denotes east longitude or the prime meridian, and a negative value denotes west longitude. The number of digits to represent the precision of the coordinate. example: '2.294481' areaType: type: string description: Area Type example country,city,region Link: type: object properties: href: type: string description: URL value format: uri methods: type: array description: HTTP methods supported by the sibling URI items: type: string rel: type: string description: >- Expose the type of relation between the current entity and the describe entity : https://www.iana.org/assignments/link-relations/link-relations.xhtml warnings: title: warnings type: object properties: code: type: integer description: >- A machine-readable error code from the Canned Messages table, that will enable the API Consumers code to handle this type of error title: type: string description: >- An error title from the Canned Messages table with a 1:1 correspondence to the error code. This may be localized detail: type: string description: >- An easy-to-read explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem. It should give the API consumer an idea of what went wrong and how to recover from it. Like the title, this field’s value can be localized. source: type: object description: The Warning Source Definition properties: parameter: type: string description: The key of the URI path or query parameter that caused the error pointer: type: string description: >- A JSON Pointer RFC6901 to the associated entity in the request body that caused this error example: type: string description: A sample input to guide the user when resolving this issue meta: title: meta type: object properties: links: type: object description: Links related to the returned object(s) properties: self: type: string description: Link to the same page. lang: type: string description: Default language of the response (fr-FR) areaVaccinated: title: areaVaccinated allOf: - type: object properties: vaccinationDoseStatus: type: string description: >- Status of Vaccination dose status ,example one dose, fully vaccinated percentage: type: number description: >- Percent of population vaccinated based on the vaccination dose status - $ref: '#/components/schemas/DatedInformation' diseaseVaccination: title: diseaseVaccination allOf: - type: object properties: isRequired: type: string referenceLink: type: string description: Webpage of vaccination regulations acceptedCertificates: type: array description: >- List of accepted certificates. Not Specified/Paper Certificate and/or the name of the app items: type: string qualifiedVaccines: type: array description: "Vaccine types recognised by the country/territory. Each entry contains the vaccine's short name and the number of days after the first/second dose for full vaccination, i.e.\_AstraZeneca 14 days after second dose" items: type: string policy: type: string description: >- Yes/No; 'Yes' indicates fully vaccinated travellers are exempt from some requirements or restrictions exemptions: type: string description: >- Entry Ban Testing Documents App Quarantine Masks Exit Domestic Restrictions; indicates what exemptions fully vaccinated travellers qualify for. Details on the exemptions are found in the 'text' section. details: type: string description: >- Text explanation of the policies and exemptions for vaccinated travellers - title: Dated Information type: object description: Confirmed information at a given date properties: date: type: string description: 'It will display the last updated date ' text: type: string

Error: buildIR: make ir: operations: path "/duty-of-care/diseases/covid19-area-report": get: responses: code 500: contents: media: "application/json": generate schema: save schema types: save referenced type: reference "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/amadeus4dev/amadeus-open-api-specification/ef8589a6e3a3f68cd04d3446deeb5167471a3f4b/spec/yaml/TravelRestrictions_v1_swagger_specification.yaml#/paths/~1duty-of-care~1diseases~1covid19-area-report/get/responses/400/content/application~1json/schema/properties/errors/items" type name conflict: "Items"
